skillsDescription: • Masters or Ph. D.  in a quantitative discipline such as Machine Learning,  Statistics,  Mathematics,  Economics,  or Computer Science  • Deep knowledge of machine learning,  data mining,  statistical,  or econometric methods  • Experience exploring,  cleaning,  visualizing and modeling data with tools like R and Python  • Ability to interpret results and articulate insights to business professionals

jobPosting.title: Research Scientist (Data Science,  Machine Learning,  Statistics,  Mathematics,  Economics)

description: Savvysherpa,  Inc.  is currently looking for innovative,  quantitative minds to work as Research Scientists.  Research Scientists participate in every stage of the research process,  from data gathering to modeling and analysis to building data products.  Research Scientists should be:  • Analytical,  articulate,  inquisitive,  and insightful  • Skilled problem solvers  • Critical thinkers • Receptive to peer review,  able to work collaboratively  • Self-motivated,  proactive,  able to work productively without supervision
